summary: I WAS SENT A RECALL NOTICE ON POSSIBLE FAULTY STEERING LINKAGE I CALLED FIRST TIME 4/23/14 TO SCHEDULE APPT. WAS TOLD BY PARTS MANAGER AT MOUNT AIRY DODGE PARTS ARE ON BACK ORDER WILL BE IN TOUCH. SAID I WAS #30 ON LIST, IN MEAN TIME RECEIVE SECOND RECALL NOTICE FROM DODGE I CALL AGAIN ON 8/26/14 STILL ON WAITING LIST WAS TOLD POSSIBILITY IN TWO WEEKS THEY WILL CALL ME. VERY DISAPPOINTED IN DODGE TO SEND OUT RECALLS BUT HAVE NO REPLACEMENTS PARTS! HOW LONG WOULD YOU WAIT?  *TR
